title: How to Quickly Max Out Emblems in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.title: Open free chests every 4 hours.
steps.content: Open free chests every 4 hours. Free chests may contain magic dust and emblem fragments. They only stack up to two times so open them as they are ready.

steps.title: Complete daily tasks to get the weekly activity chest.
steps.content: Complete daily tasks to get the weekly activity chest. Weekly activity chests give emblem fragments and magic dust.

steps.title: Be a mentor.
steps.content: Be a mentor. The in-game mentorship program gives lots of magic dust rewards. This can be thousands of magic dusts.

steps.title: Purchase the lucky common emblem chest every week.
steps.content: Purchase the lucky common emblem chest every week. This is the most valuable in-game chest because for only 800 BPs, you get 60-210 magic dust. The chest can only be bought 5 times a week so take advantage of the chest every week.

steps.title: Spin the emblem matrix.
steps.content: Spin the emblem matrix. The emblem matrix can be spun for free every 42 hours and 30 minutes. You can also spin the matrix if the featured emblem is for the role you want to prioritize because of the double reward every 5x draws.

steps.title: Spin the lucky spin when it's free.
steps.content: Spin the lucky spin when it's free. Lucky spin gives small fragment rewards. It is not recommended to spin lucky spin if it costs tickets. It is better to use those for the emblem matrix.

steps.title: Finish in-game achievements and get massive emblem rewards from leveling up.
steps.content: Finish in-game achievements and get massive emblem rewards from leveling up. Achievements have a leveling system. You level up by finishing them. Even though some specific achievements reward magic dusts, reaching certain levels in the achievement page rewards you up to 1000 worth of emblem fragments.

steps.title: Prioritize the emblems for your favorite heroes/roles.
steps.content: Prioritize the emblems for your favorite heroes/roles. When it comes to Meta heroes, it is best to not upgrade the Basic Common Emblem since it's not powerful as its other counterparts.

steps.title: Recharge on recharge gift events.
steps.content: Recharge on recharge gift events. Recharge gift events give free additional magic dusts upon recharging certain amounts of diamonds.

steps.title: Buy a monthly starlight pass.
steps.content: Buy a monthly starlight pass. The starlight pass gives 100 Magic dusts weekly and lots of tickets that you can use to draw an emblem matrix.

steps.title: Spin the magic wheel.
steps.content: Spin the magic wheel. Magic wheel's lowest tier rewards are fragments and dusts. It is recommended that you spin the wheel with magic potions 5 times a week because the magic wheel is more valuable if spun 5 times a week.
